definition: variant of 啟|启[qi3]
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
variant of 啟|启[qi3]
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
a household/door/family
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to start (a machine)/(fig.) to set in motion/to launch (an operation)/to activate (a plan)
to open/to start/(computing) to enable
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
to enlighten/to explain (a text etc)/to stimulate (a mental attitude)/enlightenment/revelation/motivation
to reveal/to enlighten/enlightenment/revelation/illumination/moral (of a story etc)/lesson
to set out on a journey
variant of 啟蒙|启蒙[qi3 meng2]/to instruct the young
to instruct the young/to initiate/to awake sb from ignorance/to free sb from prejudice or superstition/primer/enlightened/the Enlightenment/Western learning from the late Qing dynasty
variant of 啟蒙|启蒙[qi3 meng2]/to instruct the young
to instruct the young/to initiate/to awake sb from ignorance/to free sb from prejudice or superstition/primer/enlightened/the Enlightenment/Western learning from the late Qing dynasty
to edify/enlightenment
announcement (written, on billboard, letter, newspaper or website)/to post information/a notice
(of a ship) to set sail/(of an aeroplane) to take off/also written 起航[qi3 hang2]
Classical Chinese name for planet Venus in the east before dawn

sentences.english: Iwill ask the driver whsometimes we will start off.
sentences.chinese: 我会问司机我们什么时候启碇。

sentences.english: Therefore, the design of the quick-start controller is the inevitable trend.
sentences.chinese: 因此，设计与之配套的快启控制器势在必行。

sentences.english: Try to start early, if possible.
sentences.chinese: 假若可能的话，尽量早点启碇。

sentences.english: Who would inspire Britta to have more fun?
sentences.chinese: 谁会启发布瑞塔享受更多的乐趣？

sentences.english: Rev. Technology doors, Ann intelligent life.
sentences.chinese: 启科技之门，安智能生活。

sentences.english: Theyare going to think they are living in an apocalyptic time.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为他们生活在一个天启的时刻。

sentences.english: Established the foundation of quality education. Open a successful start in life.
sentences.chinese: 立素质教育之基础，启成功人生之开端。

sentences.english: At least he also recognises that Toyota has to make more exciting vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 至少他也认识到丰田必须制造更加令人兴奋的启汽车。

sentences.english: The vessel was appointed to sail on a certain Saturday early in June.
sentences.chinese: 这条船预定在六月初一个星期六启碇。

sentences.english: The President departed from Washington today.
sentences.chinese: 总统此日从华盛顿启碇。

sentences.english: A fool's lips enter into contention, and his mouth calleth for strokes.
sentences.chinese: 愚昧人张嘴启争端，开口招鞭打。
